positive_examples: This is an example of semiconductor.
We observed semiconductor in this context.
A typical case of semiconductor would involve these features.
The concept of semiconductor applies here.
A substance with electrical conductivity between that of conductors and insulators, whose conductivity can be controlled by doping or external conditions.
negative_examples: This is an example of electrolyte, not semiconductor.
This represents conductor substance in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Electrolyte, or other types of ConductorSubstance

definition: A material with electrical conductivity between conductors and insulators, used in electronics.
